positive_comments: Wouldn't change a thing - very nicely communicated!
improvement_opportunities: I would make sure and consider the cultural understandings on the use of technology and AI - not everyone has access to the most recent hardware/software/apps etc.  Having worked in the Balkans, I can attest to the difficulties of having current access and financial capabilities.

positive_comments: Another home run!!  We use those tools as well... and it's tied to generational comfort and effectiveness.
improvement_opportunities: Somewhere in there or in Module 3 - I would address generational IQ as a change management strategy. Because we know there are 5 generations in the workplace (first time in history) - we have to consider reaching all employees effectively. I know this from personal experience... our ranges are 21-75!!
